name: oh and two
description:
Make sure that both arcade.wav and oh-and-two.html are in the same directory in order to get sound to work!

If sound isn't working, please let me know and I will do my best to figure out what is wrong and how to fix it!

This is a short little Twine made for Porpentine's Twiny Jam, about the first fighting game tournament a person goes to, slightly inspired by my own mishaps at Southern California Regionals 2014.

It's short, but I hope you all enjoy if you play!
